title: Waistcoat, 1785–1800
medium: Technique: Silk plain weave with supplementary warp and supplementary wefts in silks  and metal.
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Gentleman's waistcoat with 12 buttons. Design of figures - possible Cupid and Psyche - at the bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Waistcoat, 1785–1800.
1785–1800. Technique: Silk plain weave with supplementary warp and supplementary wefts in silks  and metal.. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-54-49.
